requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['warehouse_id']=23602002
params['retail_source']="test"
params['remark']="测试修改仓库信息"
params['province']="浙江省"
params['name']="测试开放仓库3"
params['lng']="120.124972"
params['lat']="30.276212"
params['county_id']=330106
params['county']="西湖区"
params['contact_phone_num']="+86"
params['contact_phone_code']="18410438903"
params['contact_name']="王博文"
params['city']="杭州市"
params['address']="浙江省杭州市西湖区翠苑街道华星科技大厦"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.warehouse.update', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'23602002', 'retail_source' => 'test', 'remark' => '测试修改仓库信息', 'province' => '浙江省', 'name' => '测试开放仓库3', 'lng' => '120.124972', 'lat' => '30.276212', 'county_id' => '330106', 'county' => '西湖区', 'contact_phone_num' => '+86', 'contact_phone_code' => '18410438903', 'contact_name' => '王博文', 'city' => '杭州市', 'address' => '浙江省杭州市西湖区翠苑街道华星科技大厦', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

name: update
scenarios: 对独立仓的信息进行更新
